title: Is the Google support completely in lockdown because of Covid-19?
content:
I need to contact Google to get my phone replaced since it is broken, but there is no "contact us" link in any page!
My phones back is coming off!
I still have waranty for it but not for long!
And what I have heard it will take months to get phone replaced because Google never responds to support requests or aparently does not even allow me to make one!
